name: Lord Kitchener
description: '''Aldwyn Roberts''' [[Hummingbird Medal|HBM]] [[Doctor of Arts|DA]] (18 April 1922 â€“ 11 February 2000), better known by the stage name '''Lord Kitchener''' (or "'''Kitch'''"), was a Trinidadian [[calypsonian]]. He has been described as "the grand master of calypso" and "the greatest calypsonian of the post-war age".
